Title: Seishun Anime Zenshuu Specials
Description: ["Two episode, adaptations of Masao Kume's ", Student Days, " and Saneatsu Mushanokoji's ", The Friend Who Didn't Believe in Friendship, ', were not broadcast in the original run, appearing instead as two "specials" on TV Asahi the following year.', ' ', ' ', ' ', ' (Source: The Anime Encyclopedia)']
